top_risks.title: Top risks for your city
top_risks.description: Overview of the highest risk climate hazards affecting your city based on current data and projections.

hazard_comparison.title: Hazard Comparison
hazard_comparison.description: Compare different climate hazards and their components across various metrics.

sector_distribution.title: Sector Distribution
sector_distribution.description: View how climate risks are distributed across different sectors in your city.

projections.title: Future Projections
projections.description: Explore how climate hazards are projected to change over time under different scenarios.

ccra_table.title: Climate Change Risk Assessment
ccra_table.description: Detailed breakdown of all climate risks and their components.
ccra_table.description_with_assessment: Detailed breakdown of all climate risks and their components. Values have been adjusted based on Qualitative Assessment results.

qualitative_assessment.title: Get better insights.
qualitative_assessment.subtitle: Answer a few questions.
qualitative_assessment.description: Take the Qualitative Assessment Questionnaire to weigh-in other non-numerical factors in our calculations and get more tailored scorings after just 5 questions.

export.title: Access your data in one click
export.description: Export this visualization in the format that best suits your needs
